title: Life insurance claims and death benefit applications
dataVerified: Deceased name, beneficiary names, death certificate details, claim amount, policy details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent death claims and fake beneficiary claims. Domain binding verifies insurer and funeral home. High-value claims ($100K-$1M+ typical). Prevents beneficiary fraud where non-beneficiaries attempt to claim. Estate settlement verification. Critical for life insurance where death claim fraud includes faked deaths and fraudulent beneficiary documentation.
